text: فراغ الى اهله فجاء بعجل سمين

translations.translation: So he slipped off to his household and brought a fattened calf.
So he hurried to the house and brought a fatted calf,
Then he went back to his family and brought a fat roasted calf
He went quietly to his wife and returned to his guests with a fat, roasted calf.
Then he went to his home – so he brought a healthy calf.
Then he turned to his household, and brought out a roasted calf.
Then he turned aside to his family secretly and brought a fat (roasted) calf,
Then he turned to his household and brought a fattened calf,
Then he went apart unto his housefolk so that they brought a fatted calf;
Then he turned quickly to his household, and brought a fatted calf,
Then he turned away privately Unto his household, and brought a calf fatted.
Then he retired to his family and brought a fat [roasted] calf,
Then he turned quickly to his household, brought out a fatted calf,
Then he turned to his household, so brought out a roasted calf [as the property of Ibrahim (Abraham) was mainly cows].
So he turned to his household and brought a fattened calf.
Then he slipped away to his family, and brought a fatted calf.
Then he went to his family and came with a fat [roasted] calf
[51:26] Then he went aside to his family, secretly, and brought a fat calf — in sūrat Hūd [it is said], a roasted calf [Q. 11:69] —
(Then he went apart unto his housefolk so that they brought a fatted calf) a roasted, fatted calf to his guests;

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text:
وقوله تعالى: { فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰ أَهْلِهِ } معناه عَدَلَ إليهم




وقوله تعالى: { بِعِجْلٍ سَمِينٍ } معناه مشويّ

translations.translation:
And His saying, "So he went back to his family," [means that] he became just to them.


And His saying, "With a speedy, heavy camel" - this means a roasted camel.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
{ فَرَاغَ } أي: عدل
 مال عنهم فجأة خفية منهم { إِلَىٰ أَهْلِهِ فَجَآءَ بِعِجْلٍ سَمِينٍ } [الذاريات: 26] إذ كان أغلب مواشيه البقر

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
{ فَرَاغَ إِلى أهله } أي: ذهب إليهم في خِفيةٍ من ضيوفه
 فالروغان: الذهاب بسرعة
 وقيل: في خفية
 ومن آداب المضيف أن يبادر الضيف: بالقِرَى
 وأن يخفى أمره من غير أن يشعر به الضيف
 حذراً من أن يكفّه
 وكان عامة مال إبراهيم البقر
 { فجاء بعِجْلٍ سمينٍ } الفاء فصيحة تُفصح عن جُملٍ حّذفت لدلالة الحال عليها
 وإيذاناً بكمال سرعة المجيء
 أي: فذبح عجلاً فَحَنَذَه
 فجاء به
